home.title: Kỳ Duyên Savills
home.paragraph1: Specializing in real estate consulting and brokerage nationwide, focusing on two key markets: Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City.
home.paragraph2: Since 2021, Kỳ Duyên Savills has accompanied hundreds of clients in buying, selling, leasing and investing in premium segments: luxury apartments, shophouses, duplexes, penthouses…
home.paragraph3: Currently, Kỳ Duyên Savills is working at Savills Hanoi – a platform that helps her access international standard processes, transparent data systems and projects from reputable developers such as Masterise Homes, Vinhomes, Novaland, Keppel Land…
home.paragraph4: In any transaction, Kỳ Duyên Savills always places trust, expertise and customer satisfaction as the number one priority
